Title: Drug Buddies
Writer: Nick Kroll (created by), Andrew Goldberg (created by), Mark Levin (created by), Jennifer Flackett (created by), Gil Ozeri
Actors: Fred Armisen, Jessica Chaffin, Jon Daly, Richard Kind
Plot: Jess and Nick dip into her dad's stash of edibles, with mind-bending results. Andrew searches for the right moment to break up with Lola.
